8/18/2017: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $3,750,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from Philadelphia to Los Angeles (A) on 3/4/2019 (Going to LAA: CF Gerardo Parra, 2B Dilson Herrera, P Andreas Simms. Going to PHI: P Leonel Santiago)...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/4/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $1,260,009 per year...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Texas on 6/26/2020...
Traded from Seattle to Toronto on 3/2/2021 (Going to SEA: P Sherwood Wasson. Going to TOR: CF Gerardo Parra)...
10/3/2021: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $5,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2023, hitting .519 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
8/1/2024: Signed a contract extension with Baltimore, $2,580,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2025, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Traded from Baltimore to Cincinnati on 4/1/2026 (Going to CIN: CF Gerardo Parra. Going to BAL: P Vernon Thomas)...
